segments.text: I love how the boy is so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really putting in effort, climbing up on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, standing there with her hand out, completely in cahoots.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are such a perfect team in their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood adventures trying to get treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea, completely lost in her dish-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite funny how unaware she is of the mischief behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That cookie jar is practically begging to be raided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get a good haul without being caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's balancing on that stool is actually impressive, if a bit risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll have quite a story to tell, or perhaps keep secret, later.
segments.speaker: PAR
